thread.title: Man arrested for stealing entire house
thread.title_full: Man arrested for stealing entire house

author: Okogba
title: Man arrested for stealing entire house
text:
Home » News » Man arrested for stealing entire house Man arrested for stealing entire house On 3:54 pm In News by Okogba Comments 
Myanmar Police said that they arrested a man arrested in Yangon for stealing an entire house. 
“We are investigating this case now”, an officer from the South Dagon police station told dpa on Tuesday. 
Witnesses said they saw at least one person taking the house apart and taking it away in a car. 
The incident happened during the weekend on the outskirts of Yangon. 
Houses there are usually bamboo structures. 
According to local newspaper Eleven, an ownership dispute might be behind the theft. 
It was earlier sold by someone who appears to not be the rightful owner. 
The South Dagon police station filed charges against the arrested suspect. 
It is unclear if the house can be put together again. Okogba
